title: Ticket #2718: Should never happen: ComparePidAge(25720) failed
description:
User observed their Windows 7 x64 Condor 7.6.3 MasterLog on a submit machine being spammed with messages like these: 

09/19/11 12:48:53 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 12:48:53 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(25720) failed
09/19/11 13:10:33 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 13:10:33 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(25336) failed
09/19/11 13:20:44 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 13:20:44 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(8944) failed
09/19/11 14:15:24 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 14:15:24 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(4564) failed
09/19/11 15:29:39 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 15:29:39 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(21160) failed
09/19/11 15:32:19 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 15:32:19 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(22192) failed
09/19/11 15:36:20 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 15:36:20 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(17236) failed
09/19/11 15:52:09 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 15:52:09 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(17060) failed
09/19/11 16:16:07 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 16:16:07 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(2404) failed
09/19/11 16:21:22 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 16:21:22 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(27304) failed
09/19/11 16:55:04 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 16:55:04 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(8000) failed
09/19/11 17:01:33 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 17:01:33 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(21964) failed
09/19/11 17:12:07 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 17:12:07 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(29880) failed
09/19/11 17:12:07 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 17:12:07 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(8168) failed
09/19/11 17:21:19 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 17:21:19 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(25480) failed
09/19/11 17:49:42 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 17:49:42 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(17808) failed
09/19/11 18:02:20 CSysinfo::GetProcessBirthday() - OpenProcess() failed with err=87
09/19/11 18:02:20 Should never happen: ComparePidAge(6372) failed

It should never happen, but it did. Identify why. If it is possible to happen, then the message need to be improved.

Working theory: A race condition in how Condor polls for processes. Condor learns about process X. Process X exits. Condor polls process X, failing. A large stream of extremely short running jobs (perhaps vanilla, scheduler, or local) might trigger this.
creator: adesmet
